Articles.Content:
Alright everybody, I'm Rhys from Boro in the UK. I'm new to the forums just made my account two minutes ago.

Been playing KSP for a good while now. Admittedly I've been giving it a bit of a rest recently, 'cause I was caning it for months and almost lost the will to live my real life anymore (I don't go to space as much as I'd like in real life).

I have no idea what to write in here, I just thought I'd better 'cause I got booted off an owners club forum for my bike because I didn't introduce myself before going off and having a natter.

I thought I'd bosh on here and have a look at what everybody else has been doing with their space programs.

Thanks for taking the time to read this! ahaa

The feeling's mutual!
Welcome aboard, arjay2277! And don't worry, that feeling of losing your grip on reality is quite normal, and is often pointless to resist. Just let yourself go and join us...
Losing your grip on reality? Sounds like you're on an EVA. Might want to get back in the Capsule and prepare for Reentry!
...And have some cake. It's right over there.
